hiveArticle.title: An Amazing UB City Mall
hiveArticle.body:
When you are UB City mall you have enough opportunities to click photos and thus I too got into my photography mood after a long time once I came to UB City Mall.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/2oe9103c8p.jpg)
